message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $10,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. Would you consider lowering the price to $9,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $9,000 is too low. How about we meet in the middle at $9,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, would you be open to selling the product for $9,200?
